Team Calculator¶

class calculators.team_calculator.TeamCalculator(team, firebase)[source]¶

Makes all the higher level calculations for a specific team

auto_ability()[source]¶

Average points scored in autonomous

dysfunctional_percentage()[source]¶

Calculates the percentage of matches in which the robot was either not there or stopped moving

first_pick_ability()[source]¶

Calculate the first pick ability which is the predicted offensive score that the team can contribute combined with our team.

\[first\_pick\_ability(X) = predicted_score(A)\]
  • predicted_score(A) predicted score of alliance A (this team and our team)
num_completed_matches()[source]¶

Number of matches completed by this team

predict_first_tie_breaker()[source]¶

Predict the first tie breaker for rankings. Use the actual value for matches that are completed and predict the value for ones that are not.

predict_second_tie_breaker()[source]¶

Predict the second tie breaker for rankings. Use the actual value for matches that are completed and predict the values for ones that are not.

predicted_ranking_points()[source]¶

Predicts the number of ranking points at the end of qualifications using the actual ranking points from the completed matches and predicting ranking points acquired from the remaining ones.

Note:
Currently set up based on 2 for wins, 1 for ties, and 0 for loses. Additional RP will need to be added.
Returns:
predicted number of ranking points at the end of qualifications
second_pick_ability()[source]¶

Calculate the second pick ability

\[second\_pick\_ability(T) = (1 - dysfunctional\_percentage(T)) * auto\_ability(T)\]
std_auto_ability()[source]¶

Standard deviation of the points scored in autonomous

third_pick_ability()[source]¶

Calculate the third pick ability
